channel.title: RuneScorp [525] (2009 Created.)
channel.description:
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/9r6lab.jpg[/img]
[font=Verdana][b]Changes ive made[/b] Well i had enough of pvp servers and ive decided to change it to old RuneScape Pking with Pvp wildy levels and random drops just like RuneScape except everywhere is safe. [b]Question:- Why you do this? Well basically you can still pk but also you can still train skills and enjoy the server without getting killed everywhere you go[/font].
[[i]Other Features[/i]] Economy Based Medium Training Dragong Claws With Special Dragon Weapons With Specials Range Gfx Mage Gfx Perfect Edgeville Pking Deposit Box working Full Banking Bounty Hunter
-Credits- Jc-10% for blank 525 me - 90% coding
Melee In Detail -Perfect Delays between animation playing and damage splat appearing - 100% -Perfected Timers for all weapons - 100% -Perfected Defensive system that takes into account specific slash/crush/stab/range/magic bonuses. - 100% -Special Attacks (See Above) - 100% -Comboing works exceptionally well. - 100% -Prayer works exceptionally well. - 100% -Chasing in PvP - 100% -98% RS-Like max hits. - 100%
Range In Detail
-Perfected Delays between arrow pullback and the actual launch - 100% -Perfected Delay of arrow hitting and Damage splat appearing - 100% -Perfected timers for Rapid/Accurate/Longrange along with distance being able to shoot - 100% -Dark Bow perfected - 100% -Crystal bow perfected - 100% -Darts Perfected (Bronze-Dragon) - 100% -Perfected prayers that work exceptionally well - 100% -Chasing in PvP - 100% -99% maxhits for ALL weapons. - 100% -Others I can't think of off the top of my head - 100%
Magic In Detail
-A highly-advanced splashing system very similar to runescapes. - 100% -Every spell works. - 100% -All spell effects work(i.e. smoke barrage poisoning opponents) - 100% -If you click a spell before you are able to cast it, the server waits until you can successfully cast the spell then casts it. - 100% -Many secrets that make the magic system VERY closely related to runescapes magic system - 100% -Autocasting - 100% -Modern, Ancients, And Lunar magic all fully functional - 100%
[img]http://i31.tinypic.com/6iuyyt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/f1ib8o.jpg[/img] [img]http://i26.tinypic.com/aemh4h.jpg[/img] [img]http://i31.tinypic.com/11v44qr.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/1szeqd.jpg[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/28us5lh.jpg[/img] [img]http://i27.tinypic.com/4hqzk7.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2hwlflc.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2isa3a0.jpg[/img] [img]http://i30.tinypic.com/3326p1x.jpg[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/288o5dt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i28.tinypic.com/2d17mog.jpg[/img] [img]http://i32.tinypic.com/317jckl.jpg[/img]

item.title: RuneScorp [525] (2009 Created.)
item.dc:creator: @shardyboy shardyboy
item.description:
@shardyboy wrote:

[font=Verdana]Changes ive made
Well i had enough of pvp servers and ive decided to change it to old RuneScape Pking with Pvp wildy levels and random drops just like RuneScape except everywhere is safe.
[b]Question:- Why you do this?
Well basically you can still pk but also you can still train skills and enjoy the server without getting killed everywhere you go[/font].

[Other Features]
Economy Based
Medium Training
Dragong Claws With Special
Dragon Weapons With Specials
Range Gfx
Mage Gfx
Perfect Edgeville Pking
Deposit Box working
Full Banking
Bounty Hunter

-Credits-
Jc-10% for blank 525
me - 90% coding

Melee In Detail
-Perfect Delays between animation playing and damage splat appearing - 100%
-Perfected Timers for all weapons - 100%
-Perfected Defensive system that takes into account specific slash/crush/stab/range/magic bonuses. - 100%
-Special Attacks (See Above) - 100%
-Comboing works exceptionally well. - 100%
-Prayer works exceptionally well. - 100%
-Chasing in PvP - 100%
-98% RS-Like max hits. - 100%

Range In Detail

-Perfected Delays between arrow pullback and the actual launch - 100%
-Perfected Delay of arrow hitting and Damage splat appearing - 100%
-Perfected timers for Rapid/Accurate/Longrange along with distance being able to shoot - 100%
-Dark Bow perfected - 100%
-Crystal bow perfected - 100%
-Darts Perfected (Bronze-Dragon) - 100%
-Perfected prayers that work exceptionally well - 100%
-Chasing in PvP - 100%
-99% maxhits for ALL weapons. - 100%
-Others I can’t think of off the top of my head - 100%

Magic In Detail

-A highly-advanced splashing system very similar to runescapes. - 100%
-Every spell works. - 100%
-All spell effects work(i.e. smoke barrage poisoning opponents) - 100%
-If you click a spell before you are able to cast it, the server waits until you can successfully cast the spell then casts it. - 100%
-Many secrets that make the magic system VERY closely related to runescapes magic system - 100%
-Autocasting - 100%
-Modern, Ancients, And Lunar magic all fully functional - 100%
